tooltip.Time: Adjust time using the slider. (format: HHMM, only number)
tooltip.Location: Select a location by moving the slider.
tooltip.Coordinate: Enter X and Y coordinates for precise positioning. (format: only number)
tooltip.Direction: Choose the NPC's facing direction using the slider.
tooltip.Action: Select an action for the NPC using the slider.
tooltip.Talk: Enter the dialogue NPC will say upon arrival.
tooltip.Cancel: Cancel changes and revert to the previous state.
tooltip.Toggle: Switch between user-edited and original schedule data.
